(Ubochí irí atọ n'otu n'ọnwa Machị, 1929 ̊̊̊̊ruo ubochí mbụ n'ọnwa Juune, 1969) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-eme ihe nkírí na ónyé nduzi na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mbido afọ 1950 ruo na ngwụcha afọ 1960
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkírí ojii mbụ nke Disney na Warner Bros goro ọrụ.
n'ubochí irí atọ na otu n'ọnwa Machi, 1929
Dị ka nwatakịrị nwoke, ọ zụlitere ịnụ ọkụ n'obi màkà ise ihe ma bụrụ ónyé a maara màkà iburu akwụkwọ eserese ya gburugburu, na-ese foto nke 1930s na 40s L.A
Dị ka onye okenye na Manual Arts High School, o jupụtara n'akwụkwọ afọ 1947 na ihe ngosi ya nkè ndụ ụlọ akwụkwọ.
Brazil nwéré mgbalị mbụ ya na mbido afọ 1950, nkè Disney wéré ya n'ọrụ dị ka ónyé a na-enye ọzụzụ ma hapụ ya n'ime ọnwa ole na ole.
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè nkè áhụ gasịrị, Braxton maliteghachiri ọrụ animator ya na Warner Bros., n'akụkụ Ben Washam
Braxton na Washam zutere na klas abụ nke Lee Wintner na LA City College
Washam, n'oge ahụ, bụ ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na Chuck Jones na Warner Bros.
Washam ghọtara ọrụ Braxton ozugbo mgbe Braxton na-anụ ọkụ n'obi gosipụtara Washam akwụkwọ ahụ

Iji jide n'aka na Braxton ga-enweta ọrụ na Warner Bros., Washam mepụtara asịrị banyere otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ si bụrụ ónyé na-akpa ókè agbụrụ ma ghara iwe ndị na-eme ihe nkírí ojii n'ọrụ iji kpasuo Eddie Selzer, ónyé isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ iwe.
Na úbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 2019, e nyèrè Braxton Winsor McCay Award site na ASIFA (International Animated Film Association), nke kwuru, nkwenye nke ndụ ma ọ bụ onyinye ọrụ na nka nke animation.
